welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beckett Ridge, a charming city known for its friendly community and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic flights operated by Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: This concourse serves domestic and international flights operated by other airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cincinnati Municipal-Lunken Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
